alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:29AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Perry, Conway, northwestern Faulkner, east central Yell and southeastern Pope Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 929 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Atkins to near Ola. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Perryville... Atkins... Pottsville... Oppelo... Twin Groves... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Bethlehem... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Catholic Point... Hattieville... Middleton... Petit Jean State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until noon CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
